snippet.title: WarPlan Pacific || Reveal Interview with Alvaro Sousa / Kraken Studios
snippet.description:
Matrix Games' Operational Director Erik Rutins interviews Alvaro Sousa (Kraken Studios) about his new game: WarPlan Pacific.
🎮 Wishlist here 👉 https://bit.ly/3g5UbO3

WarPlan Pacific is an operational level wargame that covers all the nations at war in the Pacific theatre from December 1941 to 1945 on a massive game scale.

#HOWLive #HomeOfWargamers #FutureWargames #Matrix #MatrixGames
